description: Public authorities are required by Section 2800 of Public Authorities Law to submit annual reports to the Authorities Budget Office that include procurement contracts data.  The dataset consists of 3 years of procurement contracts data reported by Local Development Corporations. Authorities are required to report procurement transactions that have an actual or estimated value of $5,000 or more.

metadata.attribution: New York State Authorities Budget Office

name: Procurement Report for Local Development Corporations
